Token.Abstract: The AdViewDelegate protocol defines methods that a delegate of a AdView object can optionally implement to receive notifications from ad.
Sent before an ad view will begin loading ad content.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that is about to load ad content.

Token.Abstract: Sent after an ad view finished loading ad content.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view has finished loading.

Token.Abstract: Sent if SDK received client side third party campaign.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that receive 3rd party ad content.

Parameter.Name: content
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary of strings (key/values) for third party. You can start processing this content from @“type” key for determining ads type.

Token.Abstract: Sent if an ad view failed to load ad content.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that failed to load ad content.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error that occurred during loading.

Token.Abstract: Sent before an ad view will start to display internal browser.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that is about to display internal browser.

Token.Abstract: Sent after an ad view finished displaying internal browser.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view has finished displaying internal browser.

Token.Abstract: Sent before an ad view will start to open URL.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that is about to open URL.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The URL that should be opened in internal or external browser.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns YES to allow SDK open browser otherwise returns NO.

Token.Abstract: Sent after an ad process ORMMA command.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The ad view that is about to process ORMMA event.

Parameter.Name: event
Parameter.Abstract: The string with name of the event.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: The Dictionary with parameters from event.
